replies.body:
can I lick you, snowman?

why "SnowSX3", how did you create this username?
replies.body_tagged:
can I lick you, snowman?

why "SnowSX3", how did you create this username?

replies.body:
Uhh...xD

SX is from the SSX series, "Snow" has a capital S to make up that other S in SSX.
3 is from Midtown Madness 3.
My childhood in gaming.

Snow is just a name...not much special there xD
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Would you be annoyed if you had a paparazzi following you everywhere, listening on your conversations and generally stalking you? If so, what would you do?
replies.body_tagged: Would you be annoyed if you had a paparazzi following you everywhere, listening on your conversations and generally stalking you? If so, what would you do?

replies.body: Would you kill a kitten to save an African village from starving to death?
replies.body_tagged: Would you kill a kitten to save an African village from starving to death?

replies.body:
@Raysty
I played on Overcast before Avicus. One day, Howsie posted on the OCN forums and explained how he was a Director on The Avicus Network. So I decided to check this place out. I liked what I saw :)

@_ColdCraftMC_
The perma-ban happened because my Ban and Temp-ban commands weren't working properly, so I tested them out to see if it was bugged. It wasn't...
The temp-ban came when I was showing a new Moderator how to write up a temp-ban command in-game. Unfortunately, I forgot to put a "period" in front of the command, so the command went through...

@Legoman2302
Yea man!

@MapDev
I'm 17 years old.
My favourite colour's green.
I can even.

@FrozenSolstice
I would be quite annoyed. I guess I'd try and hide xD
